name: nacho
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] (US also nacho chip) a small piece of fried tortilla (= flat bread made from maize flour), often eaten with melted cheese or a dip: Dip a nacho in a bowl of salsa. a bag of nachos
Hussenot, Pierre/Foodcollection/GettyImages nachos [ plural ]
a dish made with small pieces of fried tortilla covered with melted cheese, beans, sometimes pieces of meat, and a spicy sauce: To taste real nachos you have to go to Mexico.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesHe swipes a nacho into a bowl of queso dip. I was clutching a bottle of water and a bag of nachos I had just bought.They ate corn-chip nachos with melted Tex-Mex cheese dip.Could I have some nachos and a cola?Fans slouch happily in cushy chairs, eating nachos and guzzling beer.A serving of beef and cheese nachos with sour cream and guacamole contained 1,360 calories.

served with or relating to nachos: There are industrial-sized containers of nacho cheese and ketchup.
More examplesFewer examplesThe most common seasoning used is nacho cheese.When I was in the Mexican food section I spotted the nacho sauces.You may want to melt some cheese to make a nacho dip.
